N=int(raw_input())
T=int(raw_input())
m=map(int,raw_input().split())
t=map(int,raw_input().split())
dp = [[0]*(2) for i in range(T+1)]
for i in range(N):
	for x in xrange(T,t[i]-1,-1):
		dp[x][0]=max(dp[x][0],dp[x-t[i]][0]+m[i])
		dp[x][1]=max(dp[x][1],dp[x-t[i]][1]+m[i],dp[x-t[i]][0]+2*m[i])
print dp[T][1]
